name: Dwarven Purification
Dwarven Reversion
Dwarven Regression
desc: You consumed purifier.
You consumed a large amount of purifier.  Why does it feel so strange?
You consumed a huge amount of purifier, and you can tell that something isn't right.

name: The Longing
The Longing
The Longing
The Longing
desc: You miss the wind through the trees.
You're dragging; all this civilization is getting you down.
You feel run down and achy.  You need to get out to the forests.
Every movement is an effort.  Every time you close your eyes you imagine yourself walking beneath the boughs of ancient trees.

name: Under the Boughs
desc: Your time in the wilderess is rejuvenating you.
